sentences.en: She vowed to avenge her brother's death.
sentences.cn: 她发誓要为哥哥之死报仇。

sentences.en: Adonis was later killed by a wild boar – an attack that may have been arranged to avenge another of Adonis' romantic intrigues.
sentences.cn: Adonis 后来被一头野猪杀死——一次袭击可能被安排来报复 Adonis 的另一个浪漫的阴谋。

sentences.en: He promised to avenge his father's murder.
